description:
The lightweight Nano is ready for a hike on the local trails a visit to the street markets of Europe. A low-profile packable design makes it easy to stuff inside your checked luggage, then deploy at your destination. The zippered rear compartment is set up to carry a hydration reservoir for hiking, but also doubles as a secure home for your tablet or laptop on urban excursions.

  • Light yet abrasion-resistant 210-denier nylon ripstop, with an extra-durable 420-denier nylon base panel
  • Perforated foam harness to comfortably carry the load without excess weight
  • Magnetic sternum strap for one-handed buckling and quick parking for a DryLock bite valve
  • Webbing waistbelt stabilizes the load (you can remove it if you don't need it)
  • Zippered pocket houses the 3L hydration reservoir or doubles as a sleeve for a tablet or 13in. laptop
  • Zippered front pocket has an internal organizer and a key clip
  • Side mesh pocket carries a water bottle
  • Front loop lets you clip on a blinky light and reflective side loops secure water bottles or other gear
name: Gregory Nano 22 H2O Daypack - Unisex
